snippet: Annette Boswort, who lost with 6 percent of the vote, was charged on Wednesday with several counts of perjury and filing false election documents.
abstract: Annette Bosworth, failed Senate candidate who lost South Dakota primary with mere 6 percent of vote, is charged with several counts of perjury and filing false election documents.
lead_paragraph: Annette Boswort, who lost with 6 percent of the vote, was charged on Wednesday with several counts of perjury and filing false election documents.

headline.main: Senate Candidate Arrested After G.O.P. Primary Loss in South Dakota
